> restart;Digits:=30;
                          Digits := 30
> tt:=proc( k, t )
>   local sq,sq2,c,aa,c_b,i,n,r,g,n1;
>   sq := evalf(sqrt(k));
>   r[2]:=t;
>   sq2 := sq*2;

>   aa  := ( k / ( k - sq ) );
>   c_b := frac(k/aa) + r[2];
>   i := (k/c_b);
>   n := c=i;
>   r[1] := solve(n,r[1]);
>   g:=k/(sq-r[3]);
>   n1:=i=g;
>   r[3]:=evalf(solve(n1,r[3]));
> end proc:
> tt(33,10);%+5.0108747069239426802;
                -4.51087470692394268029877706358
                0.49999999999999999990122293642
